name: Wild Adventures
description:
Wild Adventures - is the simplest 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do different hardcore levels playing as a sheriff living in the Wild West. The aim of the game is very simple. You have to collect definite numbers of things on the level and not to bump into any trap or obstacle. The game is hard enough because you have only one life to do the level. If you are unlucky, you will be able to try again. Go ahead to adventures!

KEY FEATURES:

- Long levels.
- Simple gameplay.
- Nice soundtrack.
- Good impressions of the game.
